About us:
We catch fish.

Norway Bay Fishing offers people the experience to go on a guided fishing trip with one of the Ottawa Rivers youngest, and most successful fishing guides. Our goal is to share our love for fishing and to teach others how to catch some of the best game fish in North America. Noa is 16 years old and has years of fishing and guiding experience.

Located in big fish territory.

Norway Bay Fishing is located on the Ottawa River in Norway Bay, Quebec. We’re only 1 hour west from Ottawa between the 2 towns of Quyon and Shawville in the Pontiac region. There’s a public beach, chip stand, local store, and bathrooms for your convenience. Hop in the car and you will be out fishing before you know it.

All the proof you need.

Bass, Northern Pike, Walleye, and Muskie are the fish species we target. Catching Bass, Walleye, and small Pike is constant loads of fun. But hooking into a big Pike or Musky is one of the most thrilling moments someone can experience. Here are some pictures of the fish we’ve caught or have helped others catch.
